body:
<off topic> Well, hi guys! Looks like i have skool again. Im not as active but ill be on. :) </off topic>


Ok i was thinking if i could do an Avicus story Lore. Some people may have seen my OCN lLore's. (made 2 parts) so i was thinking of making an avicus one because Avicus is liek my 2nd server :)
I would post the link of my OCN lore's if you wanna check how good they are but i need staff perms. i think. idk. So heres a general summary of my OCN lore if link is not allowed


So Long ago, ocn tribes was invaded by bad guys invaded,  ocn tribesunited by 5 guys, crushed evil empire, golden age, evil empire invades again, torture for 24 years, great war, pay2win are bad guys, OCN, kohi, avicus, badlion RMCT, unite to stop hypixel and hive. Thats basically it. Here's a map so far. (Prple is bad guys)



So do you want me to add you guys to the lore? Or make like a totally separate Lore for Avicus. (Your still in the map above but it will be all about you guys)

Feel free for suggestions and
anything you want me to add! (please dont say yourself) I mean like what things to add in the lore (places, cities, armies, etc..)


So discuss :)



EDIT: Heres the original map. Note that some causes of the war was cuz Hypixel was over populated. Also, i did not intended to make Overcast that big. Sowwy. Let's just say they did not use a lot of land and who knows, maybe at the end, OCN shares some territory to Avicus? idk im crazy.

replies.body:
Lel, Kohi, Badlion, OCN, and Avicus would whoop all the P2W servers' butts. The skill gap is HUGE.

Anyway, I love the concept. However, the grammar isn't that good. But nobody's perfect. Keep the lore as the same, and If you want, I could write the lore for you? *Wink* *Wink*
